Name: Screaming Orgasm
Ingredients: 37.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Garnish with a dusting of chocolate powder.
Review: As fattening as it is alcoholic, this indugent, creamy dessert in a glass cocktail is served with generous innuendo.
History: One of the best-known cocktails from the 1980s .
Nutrition: One serving of Screaming Orgasm contains 549 calories
